verses.verse: Now these are the generations <WH8435> of the sons <WH1121> of Noah <WH5146>, Shem <WH8035>, Ham <WH2526>, and Japheth <WH3315>: and unto them were sons <WH1121> born <WH3205> after <WH310> the flood <WH3999>.
The sons <WH1121> of Japheth <WH3315>; Gomer <WH1586>, and Magog <WH4031>, and Madai <WH4074>, and Javan <WH3120>, and Tubal <WH8422>, and Meshech <WH4902>, and Tiras <WH8494>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Gomer <WH1586>; Ashkenaz <WH813>, and Riphath <WH7384>, and Togarmah <WH8425>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Javan <WH3120>; Elishah <WH473>, and Tarshish <WH8659>, Kittim <WH3794>, and Dodanim <WH1721>.

By these were the islands <WH339> of the Nations <WH1471> divided in <WH6504> their lands <WH776>; every one <WH376> after his tongue <WH3956>, after their families <WH4940>, in their nations <WH1471>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Ham <WH2526>; Cush <WH3568>, and Mizraim <WH4714>, and Phut <WH6316>, and Canaan <WH3667>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Cush <WH3568>; Seba <WH5434>, and Havilah <WH2341>, and Sabtah <WH5454>, and Raamah <WH7484>, and Sabtecha <WH5455>: and the sons <WH1121> of Raamah <WH7484>; Sheba <WH7614>, and Dedan <WH1719>.
And Cush <WH3568> fathered <WH3205> Nimrod <WH5248>: he began <WH2490> to be <WH1961> a mighty one <WH1368> in the earth <WH776>.

He was a mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> against <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>: therefore <WH3651> it is said <WH559>, Even as Nimrod <WH5248> the mighty <WH1368> hunter <WH6718> against <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068>.
And the beginning <WH7225> of his kingdom <WH4467> was Babel <WH894>, and Erech <WH751>, and Accad <WH390>, and Calneh <WH3641>, in the land <WH776> of Shinar <WH8152>.
Out of that land <WH776> went forth <WH3318> Asshur <WH804>, and built <WH1129> Nineveh <WH5210>, and the city <WH5892> Rehoboth <WH7344>, and Calah <WH3625>,
And Resen <WH7449> between Nineveh <WH5210> and Calah <WH3625>: the same is a great <WH1419> city <WH5892>.
And Mizraim <WH4714> fathered <WH3205> Ludim <WH3866>, and Anamim <WH6047>, and Lehabim <WH3853>, and Naphtuhim <WH5320>,
And Pathrusim <WH6625>, and Casluhim <WH3695>, (out of whom came <WH3318> Philistim <WH6430>), and Caphtorim <WH3732>.
And Canaan <WH3667> fathered <WH3205> Sidon <WH6721> his firstborn <WH1060>, and Heth <WH2845>,
And the Jebusite <WH2983>, and the Amorite <WH567>, and the Girgasite <WH1622>,
And the Hivite <WH2340>, and the Arkite <WH6208>, and the Sinite <WH5513>,
And the Arvadite <WH721>, and the Zemarite <WH6786>, and the Hamathite <WH2577>: and afterward <WH310> were the families <WH4940> of the Canaanites <WH3669> spread abroad <WH6327>.

And the border <WH1366> of the Canaanites <WH3669> was from Sidon <WH6721>, as you come <WH935> to Gerar <WH1642>, unto Gaza <WH5804>; as you go <WH935> unto Sodom <WH5467>, and Gomorrah <WH6017>, and Admah <WH126>, and Zeboim <WH6636>, even unto Lasha <WH3962>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Ham <WH2526>, after their families <WH4940>, after their tongues <WH3956>, in their countries <WH776>, and in their nations <WH1471>.
Unto Shem <WH8035> also <WH1>, the father of all the sons <WH1121> of Eber <WH5677>, the brother <WH251> of Japheth <WH3315> the elder <WH1419>, even to him were sons born <WH3205>.
The sons <WH1121> of Shem <WH8035>; Elam <WH5867>, and Asshur <WH804>, and Arphaxad <WH775>, and Lud <WH3865>, and Aram <WH758>.
And the sons <WH1121> of Aram <WH758>; Uz <WH5780>, and Hul <WH2343>, and Gether <WH1666>, and Mash <WH4851>.
And Arphaxad <WH775> fathered <WH3205> Salah <WH7974>; and Salah <WH7974> fathered <WH3205> Eber <WH5677>.

And unto Eber <WH5677> were born <WH3205> two <WH8147> sons <WH1121>: the name <WH8034> of one <WH259> was Peleg <WH6389>; for in his days <WH3117> was the earth <WH776> divided <WH6385>; and his brother <WH251>'s name <WH8034> was Joktan <WH3355>.
And Joktan <WH3355> fathered <WH3205> Almodad <WH486>, and Sheleph <WH8026>, and Hazarmaveth <WH2700>, and Jerah <WH3392>,
And Hadoram <WH1913>, and Uzal <WH187>, and Diklah <WH1853>,
And Obal <WH5745>, and Abimael <WH39>, and Sheba <WH7614>,
And Ophir <WH211>, and Havilah <WH2341>, and Jobab <WH3103>: all these were the sons <WH1121> of Joktan <WH3355>.
And their living <WH4186> was from Mesha <WH4852>, as you go <WH935> unto Sephar <WH5611> a mountain <WH2022> of the east <WH6924>.
These are the sons <WH1121> of Shem <WH8035>, after their families <WH4940>, after their tongues <WH3956>, in their lands <WH776>, after their nations <WH1471>.

These are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Noah <WH5146>, after their generations <WH8435>, in their nations <WH1471>: and by these were the nations <WH1471> divided <WH6504> in the earth <WH776> after <WH310> the flood <WH3999>.
